sentences.sContent: Many of the girls seemed to be infused with excitement on seeing the snow.
sentences.sCn: 许多女孩子似乎一看到雪心里就充满了兴奋。

remMethod.val: in(进入) + fus(流) + e → 流进去 → 注入， 灌输

trans.tranCn: 灌输, 注入, 沏或泡(茶、药等), 浸渍, 鼓舞
trans.tranOther: to fill something or someone with a particular feeling or quality
